define.name: nof_af_nif_indications
define.doc: Number of AF NIF FC infications

define.name: nof_cal_llfcs
define.doc: Number of Link-Level FC (from the NIF-RX-MLF) that can be mapped to calendar.

define.name: nof_entries_qmlf
define.doc: Number of entries in the Rx Quad MAC Lane FIFO (QMLF).

numeric.name: bcm_cos_count
numeric.doc: Number of priorities per NIF port

feature.name: fc_to_nif_status
feature.doc: Indication if presenting status for FC from CFC to NIF is supported

feature.name: ilu_fc_status
feature.doc: Indication if presenting status indication for FC from and to ILU is supported

feature.name: inb_ilkn_rx_status
feature.doc: Indication if presenting status indication for received Inband ILKN FC signals is supported

feature.name: glb_res_lp_to_llfc
feature.doc: Indication if generation from Global Resources Low Priority to LLFC is supported

feature.name: vsqd_to_llfc_pfc
feature.doc: Indication if generation from VSQ D to LLFC and PFC is supported

feature.name: oob_tx_reset
feature.doc: Indication if reset of OOB-TX interface is supported

feature.name: additional_enablers
feature.doc: Indication if additional CFC enablers are supported

feature.name: ilkn_inb_llfc
feature.doc: Indication if additional CFC enablers for the Inband ILKN are supported

feature.name: glb_rsc_oob_en
feature.doc: Indication if table GLB_RSC_OOB_EN is supported

feature.name: cat2_oob_en
feature.doc: Indication if table CAT2_OOB_EN is supported

feature.name: pfc_rec_cdu_shift
feature.doc: The last two CDUs of each core have one bit shift left, which is affecting the reception of PFC - CFC is sending wrong index to EGQ

feature.name: pfc_status_regs_double_read
feature.doc: Registers for EGQ PFC status and NIF PFC status are both 'sticky' and will clear on read only.Changing the STATUS_SEL for each of them will result with an OR between two different ranges of the PFC vector.

feature.name: ilkn_oob_fast_llfc
feature.doc: Dedicated enabler for ILKN OOB fast LLFC.

feature.name: pp_inb_enable
feature.doc: Indication if table PP Inand enabler is supported

feature.name: fc_from_llfc_vsq_status_sel
feature.doc: Indication if select is needed in order to present status for FC from VSQ LLFC to CFC is supported

feature.name: if_2_cfc_enablers
feature.doc: Indication if enablers or interfaces to CFC are supported

feature.name: ilkn_oob_en
feature.doc: Indication if enablers for the RX/TX ILKN OOB interfaces are supported

feature.name: ilkn_polarity_set
feature.doc: Indication if setting the ILKN OOB polarity is supported

define.name: nof_coe_cal_instances
define.doc: Number of PP COE calendar instances

define.name: nof_supported_vlan_ids
define.doc: Number of supported VLAN IDs in PP COE flow control

define.name: nof_coe_vid_right_shift_width
define.doc: Number of COE VID right shift width

define.name: max_coe_ticks
define.doc: Max value for COE ticks. N-1 where N number of clocks for pause counters decrement.

numeric.name: calendar_pause_resolution
numeric.doc: PP COE Pause counter rate. Unit: usec.

numeric.name: data_offset
numeric.doc: Define offset in bytes from after Ethernet Frame for COE FC data. Valid range = [0-31]

numeric.name: ethertype
numeric.doc: Set ethertype of COE FC packet.(16bits)

numeric.name: control_opcode
numeric.doc: Set PP COE Control Opcode used to identify COE.(16bits)

numeric.name: coe_vid_right_shift
numeric.doc: Set right shift for COE VID shift

value.name: mac
value.doc: Set the mac address of COE FC packet (48 bits)

define.name: nof_oob_ids
define.doc: Number of Out of Band interfaces.

value.name: tx
value.doc: Flow Control Out-Of-Band TX calender length.

value.name: rx
value.doc: Flow Control Out-Of-Band RX calender length.

value.name: tx
value.doc: Flow Control Out-Of-Band TX repeat count.

value.name: rx
value.doc: Flow Control Out-Of-Band RX repeat count.

table.name: tx_freq
table.doc: Flow Control OOB TX Speed relatively to the Core Clock.

value.name: ratio
value.doc: Flow Control OOB TX Speed ratio

table.name: port
table.doc: Flow Control Out-Of-Band port type and port mode.

table.name: indication_invert
table.doc: his option controls the meaning of '0'/'1' in the of Calendar FC indications per interface.

value.name: tx
value.doc: Flow Control In-Band ILKN TX calender length.

value.name: rx
value.doc: Flow Control In-Band ILKN RX calender length.

define.name: nof_inband_intlkn_cal_instances
define.doc: Number of Inband ILKN calendar instances

numeric.name: cdum_intr_id
numeric.doc: PFC Deadlock detection interrupt ID for CDUM block.

numeric.name: cdu_intr_id
numeric.doc: PFC Deadlock detection interrupt ID for CDU block.

numeric.name: clu_intr_id
numeric.doc: PFC Deadlock detection interrupt ID for CLU block.
